class.name: rqt_plot_qtcharts/PlotQtCharts
class.description: A native C++ plugin for visualizing numeric values in a 2D plot using the native QtCharts plotting backend.

qtgui.label: Plot (QtCharts)
qtgui.statustip: A nateive C++ plugin for visualizing numeric values in a 2D plot using the native QtCharts plotting backend.
